text: Ani amhi tyance kahi sathidara nirdharita kelele hote, jyanni tyancya pudhacya magacya karmanna tyancya najareta sundara susobhita banavuna thevale hote, ani tyancya babatitahi allahaca vayada tya janasamuhansobata purna jhala, je tyancyapurvi jinnance ani manavance ho'una gele aheta. Nihsansaya te nukasana ucalanare sid'dha tharale
